article.title: Army Modifies Training Model Support Contract
article.text: Technical and Project Engineering, Alexandria, Virginia, was awarded a $12,084,389 modification (P00002 ) to contract W91CRB-13-C-0036 for professional software development and support, testing, training, and software and database maintenance services to support Army training models. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
